name: Gowf
description:
Gowf is an arcade style golf game with a classic 3-click hit system inspired by old school Mario Golf and Hot Shots video game franchises. Featuring an RPG style adventure mode where you can level-up and customize your character's skills and equipment to win tournaments across a variety of courses. Unlock equipment, courses, skills and cosmetics on your way to becoming the best golfer in the world!
